```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(ZikaModel)
```

## Running the base model
To run the deterministic version of the model, without seasonality and interventions, 
you can do the following:

```{r}
# create a vector of human age groups 
age_init <- c(1, 9, 10, 10, 10, 10, 10, 10, 10, 10, 10)
  
# create a vector of human mortality rates 
deathrt <- c(1e-10, 
             1e-10, 
             1e-10, 
             0.00277068683332695, 
             0.0210680857689784,
             0.026724997685722,
             0.0525354529367476,
             0.0668013582441452,
             0.119271483740379,
             0.279105747097929,
             0.390197266957464)
             
# provide the length of time (in days) that you want to run the model for
time_frame <- 364 * 50

# run the model
model_run <- ZikaModel::run_model(agec = age_init,
                                  death = deathrt,
                                  nn_links,
                                  time = time_frame)

model_run$plot
```
